<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	interface Props extends CommandPrimitive.RootProps {
		class?: string;
	}

	let { class: className, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<CommandPrimitive.Root
	class={cn(
		"flex h-full w-full flex-col overflow-hidden rounded-xl glass-heavy shadow-glass-lg",
		className
	)}
	{...rest}
>
	{@render rest.children?.()}
</CommandPrimitive.Root>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends CommandPrimitive.ListProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<CommandPrimitive.List
	class={cn("max-h-[300px] overflow-y-auto overflow-x-hidden", className)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</CommandPrimitive.List>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends CommandPrimitive.GroupProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<CommandPrimitive.Group
	class={cn(
		"overflow-hidden p-1 text-foreground [&_[data-command-group-heading]]:px-2 [&_[data-command-group-heading]]:py-1.5 [&_[data-command-group-heading]]:text-xs [&_[data-command-group-heading]]:font-medium [&_[data-command-group-heading]]:text-muted-foreground",
		className
	)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</CommandPrimitive.Group>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends CommandPrimitive.ItemProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<CommandPrimitive.Item
	class={cn(
		"relative flex cursor-pointer select-none items-center rounded-lg px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-none transition-colors data-[selected]:bg-glass-light data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled]:opacity-50",
		className
	)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</CommandPrimitive.Item>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	interface Props extends CommandPrimitive.SeparatorProps {
		class?: string;
	}

	let { class: className, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<CommandPrimitive.Separator class={cn("-mx-1 h-px bg-glass-border", className)} {...rest} />

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends CommandPrimitive.EmptyProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<CommandPrimitive.Empty class={cn("py-6 text-center text-sm text-muted-foreground", className)} {...rest}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</CommandPrimitive.Empty>
